attributes.action: change the law so there has to be evidence for sexual assault cases - stop false accusations!
attributes.additional_details:
Huge amounts of people are being wrongly and falsely accused of sexual assault and child sexual assault on no evidence at all!!  They are convicted on pure here-say and given lengthy sentences!  This is happening far to often and innocent peoples lives are being ruined.  This must stop!!
The accusers are given large amounts of compensation and it is all too easy to accuse someone falsely.
The law needs to change so that there is actual evidence against the accused.
